select clmst.ACCOUNT_CD as cldivAccountID, clmst.CLDIVCD as cldivID, clmst.DIVNM as dClientName, jobtrn.JOB_CD as jobNo, jobtrn.`ADDDATE` as jobCreateDate, ifnull(sellordertrn.DLVDAY,jobtrn.PLAN_DALDAY) as planDlvday, case when sellordertrn.JOB_CD is not null then "1" else "0" end as isSellFlg, jobtrn.JOB_NAME as jobName, salemst.SALE_NAME as saleTypName, reqClmst.DIVNM as rClientName, gClmst.DIVNM as gClientName from jobtrn left join sellordertrn on jobtrn.JOB_CD = sellordertrn.JOB_CD and jobtrn.COMPANY_CD=sellordertrn.COMPANY_CD and sellordertrn.DEL_FLG != 1 left join clmst on jobtrn.CLDIV_CD = clmst.CLDIVCD and clmst.COMPANY_CD=jobtrn.COMPANY_CD left join clmst as reqClmst on jobtrn.PAYER_CD = reqClmst.CLDIVCD and reqClmst.COMPANY_CD=jobtrn.COMPANY_CD left join clmst as gClmst on jobtrn.G_COMPANY = gClmst.CLDIVCD and gClmst.COMPANY_CD=jobtrn.COMPANY_CD left join salemst on jobtrn.SALE_TYP = salemst.SALE_CD and salemst.COMPANY_CD = jobtrn.COMPANY_CD where jobtrn.COMPANY_CD=#{companyID} and jobtrn.DEL_FLG != 1
and clmst.ACCOUNT_CD = #{accountCD}
and date_format(ifnull(sellordertrn.DLVDAY,jobtrn.PLAN_DALDAY),"%Y%m") >= date_format(#{startDate},"%Y%m")
and date_format(ifnull(sellordertrn.DLVDAY,jobtrn.PLAN_DALDAY),"%Y%m") <= date_format(#{endDate},"%Y%m")

SELECT divClmst.CLDIVCD as cldivID, divClmst.DIVNM as dClientName, reqClmst.DIVNM as rClientName, jobtrn.JOB_CD as jobNo, journal.ORDER_NO as costNo, CASE WHEN journal.TYPE_FLG = 2 THEN paytrn.INPUT_NO WHEN journal.TYPE_FLG = 3 THEN lendtrn.NEW_INPUT_NO WHEN journal.TYPE_FLG = 4 THEN trantrn.NEW_INPUT_NO END as inputNo, CASE WHEN journal.FISCAL_MONTH = DATE_FORMAT(#{choseDate},"%Y%m") then 0 else journal.DEBTOR_AMOUNT END as lastMonthResidual, CASE WHEN journal.FISCAL_MONTH = DATE_FORMAT(#{choseDate},"%Y%m") then journal.DEBTOR_AMOUNT else 0 END as thisMonthHappened, CASE WHEN journal.TYPE_FLG = 2 THEN DATE_FORMAT(paytrn.CONFIRMDATE,"%Y-%m-%d") WHEN journal.TYPE_FLG = 3 THEN DATE_FORMAT(lendtrn.CONFIRMDATE,"%Y-%m-%d") WHEN journal.TYPE_FLG = 4 THEN DATE_FORMAT(trantrn.CONFIRMDATE,"%Y-%m-%d") END as confirmDate, 0 as thisMonthAccurate, IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(SALEADDDATE,"%Y-%m-%d"),"") as planDlvday, 0 as isThisMonthHappened from jobtrn left join sellordertrn on jobtrn.JOB_CD = sellordertrn.JOB_CD and jobtrn.COMPANY_CD = sellordertrn.COMPANY_CD left join clmst as divClmst on jobtrn.CLDIV_CD = divClmst.CLDIVCD and jobtrn.COMPANY_CD = divClmst.COMPANY_CD left join clmst as reqClmst on jobtrn.PAYER_CD = reqClmst.CLDIVCD and jobtrn.COMPANY_CD = reqClmst.COMPANY_CD join journal on jobtrn.JOB_CD = journal.JOB_NO and jobtrn.COMPANY_CD = journal.COMPANY_CD left join paytrn on journal.INPUT_NO = paytrn.INPUT_NO and journal.COMPANY_CD = paytrn.COMPANY_CD left join lendtrn on journal.INPUT_NO = lendtrn.INPUT_NO and journal.COMPANY_CD = lendtrn.COMPANY_CD left join trantrn on journal.INPUT_NO = trantrn.INPUT_NO and journal.COMPANY_CD = trantrn.COMPANY_CD where jobtrn.COMPANY_CD=#{companyID} and DATE_FORMAT(ifnull(sellordertrn.DLVDAY,jobtrn.PLAN_DALDAY),"%Y%m") > DATE_FORMAT(#{choseDate},"%Y%m") and journal.FISCAL_MONTH <= DATE_FORMAT(#{choseDate},"%Y%m") and journal.DEBTOR_CD = "009" union all
